column2:
# make call to api
nyc_race_2020_dc <- get_decennial(
  geography = "tract",
  state = "New York",
  county = c(
                "Bronx",
                "Kings",
                "New York",
                "Queens", 
                "Richmond"),
  year = 2020,
  variables = c(White = "P2_005N",
                Black = "P2_006N",
                Native = "P2_007N",
                Asian = "P2_008N",
                Latinx = "P2_002N"),
  key = Sys.getenv("CENSUS_API"),
  summary_var = "P2_001N",
  geometry = T,
  cb = F
) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 2263) %>% 
  erase_water(area_threshold = 0.75)
